title: The phase behavior of CO2 injection in shale reservoirs with nano-pores
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27227-27240
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01239A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tao Wan, Kun Ding, Qiyong Xiong, Jing Guo
The solubility of CO2 in formation water, crude oil and oil–water mixtures was determined. The effect of nano-pore confinement on the solubility of CO2 was analyzed.
